text: "Yes?" he lowered his eyes and kissed her on the mouth, an act of devotion he didn't over-indulge. "What about it, my sweet?" "Well," she laughed suddenly in an upsurging of relief, "that stupid Gubbins boy thought he saw you at the Load of Trouble. With a blonde, too. Imagine!" Nigel was frowning. He looked distinguished when he frowned; boyishly handsome at other times.
